timeline.message: Provides an initial implementation of the Tycho Search Framework.
Also selects the title and salutation when rendering a list of users.
Provides open search providers for user accounts.
Provides open search providers for user tenants.
Provides an open search provider for jobs.
Provides an open search provider for VFS roots.
Fixes a JS bug in the scaffolding UI.
Fixes a JS bug in the scaffolding UI.
Adds an initial and minimal documentation.
